channel.title: CVE Feed for Mozilla -- Mozilla VPN client for Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mozilla -- Mozilla VPN client for Linux

item.title: CVE-2023-4104|2023-09-11T08:02:53.854Z -- mozilla -- mozilla%20vpn%20client%20for%20linux
item.description: An invalid Polkit Authentication check and missing authentication requirements for D-Bus methods allowed any local user to configure arbitrary VPN setups. *This bug only affects Mozilla VPN on Linux. Other operating systems are unaffected.* This vulnerability affects Mozilla VPN client for Linux < v2.16.1.
